attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed recently that despite the Bank of England reducing interest rates to 1%, many credit card issuers have increased charges by 5% and more, some to 34%. Are customers being charged for the terrible mistakes the banks have made? How can they justify these outrageous rates of interest?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
